Text: There won´t be any shows in the US anymore this week...because of the college basketball... :-) See you next week..
thanks msfenmore for doing this everyday. have a great weekend!!
Thank you from Australia, Ms Fenmore.  We really appreciate your efforts.
Thank you, MsFenmore. :-) You are appreciated very much!
Thankyou very much Ms Fenmore,I have been loving the 40th anniversary snippits we have been getting before each show,wonderful.

Thanks so much
Please can you upload The Talk YR special next Monday? I would love to see that 
:)
thanks again!
Yes, I think I can upload the Talk...shouldn´t be a problem..

Thanks Ms F. I can't believe that YR gets usurped for Sport in the US. We used to cop this all the time when it was aired here in Australia by the network which also had the cricket. Episodes that were 3 years behind the US got pushed even further back, to the point where they mad a "catch up" series. Even then it was still a year behind.

We didn't know this til my wife's sister started sending her TV magazines (The Star, National Enquirer) and we're reading stuff about YR which hadn't happened yet for us... 

Talk about spoilers to the max!!!

Me either on it's 40th Anniverary shows they had to stick a basketball games iint the middle of it all. Plus when I downloaded the one it showed up as March 19 insted March 20th.
Didn't know if anyone knew but if you have DirecTV you can also watch these on channel 262 at 7 & 10 PM USA Estern Time too
